wave_0_per_point1= freqLvlL = -10.4*pow(value1,1.81)/pow(value1,1.8)+10.2;
wave_0_per_point2= myAmpL = if(below(freqLvlL,0.5),freqLvlL,0.49);

wave_0_per_point4= myColL = 15*(1-myFreqR);

wave_0_per_point11=g = sin(time+value1+myFreqL-1*Pi23)+1/(1-1/value1);//15*(1-myFreqL)+0.555555;//x/sin(time);

wave_1_per_point12=b = sin(time-value1-myFreqL+2*Pi23)+1/(1-1/value1);//myDith;//myColR+0.333333;//y-x+sin(time);

per_frame_1=tic = min(time-tin,.1);
per_frame_2=tin = time;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=ra = 1/tic*.25;
per_frame_5=treb_avg = tic*(treb_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*treb);
per_frame_6=mid_avg = tic*(mid_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*mid);
per_frame_7=bass_avg = tic*(bass_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*bass);
per_frame_8=vav = tic*(vav*(1/tic - ra) + ra*(bass+treb+mid)*.33333);
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=tt = tt + tic*treb;
per_frame_11=mt = mt + tic*mid;
per_frame_12=bt = bt + tic*bass;
per_frame_13=vt = vt + tic*vav;
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=q1 = tt*4;
per_frame_17=q2 = mt*4;
per_frame_18=q3 = bt*4;
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=st = .04;
per_frame_21=q4 = treb_avg*st;
per_frame_22=q5 = mid_avg*st;
per_frame_23=q6 = bass_avg*st;
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=warp = vav*.2;
per_frame_26=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    // take the difference between the crisp and blurred images,
warp_7=`    // then add it back into the image.  Creates spots and stripes over time.
warp_8=`    ret += (ret - GetBlur2(uv))*0.6;
warp_9=`    ret *= 0.9;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`   // add noise:
warp_12=`   float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 0.4 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_13=`   ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0 * 12 * saturate(treb_att-1);
warp_14=`
warp_15=`   // desaturate over time, to keep the globs white
warp_16=`   ret = lerp(ret, lum(ret), 0.08);
warp_17=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`float2 uv2 = uv;
comp_4=`uv.x=1-uv.x;
comp_5=`float3 orig,nex;
comp_6=`float3 orig2,nex2;
comp_7=`orig=tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
comp_8=`orig2=tex2D(sampler_main,uv2);
comp_9=`nex=tex2D(sampler_main,float2(uv.x+0.001,uv.y));
comp_10=`nex2=tex2D(sampler_main,float2(uv2.x+0.001,uv2.y));
comp_11=`if(abs(orig.x+orig.y+orig.z-nex.x-nex.y-nex.z)>0.1)
comp_12=`{ret=GetBlur2(uv);}else
comp_13=`{ret=GetBlur3(uv);}; 
comp_14=`
comp_15=`float3 ret2;
comp_16=`if(abs(orig2.x+orig2.y+orig2.z-nex2.x-nex2.y-nex2.z)>0.1)
comp_17=`{ret2=GetBlur2(uv2);}else
comp_18=`{ret2=GetBlur3(uv2);}; 
comp_19=`
comp_20=`ret+=GetBlur2(uv)+normalize(ret-0.1);
comp_21=`ret2+=GetBlur2(uv2)+normalize(ret2-0.1);
comp_22=`ret-=ret2;
comp_23=`}
